skillTree.name: Sadistic
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

skillTree.name: Sea Dragon Cloak
skillTree.description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.

skillTree.name: Seek New Corsairs
skillTree.description: New groups of cutthroats and murderers must be found to replenish the ranks.

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: Treason is never straightforward, especially when your every move is watched and reported.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Plunder Troves
skillTree.description: The Reaver keeps private chests filled with riches stashed away, to be used to persuade the Druchii nobility... and provide for any personal desire.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Raiders
skillTree.description: Take it all!

skillTree.name: Pillage
skillTree.description: Don't kill everyone, we will be back.

skillTree.name: Sword and Handbow
skillTree.description: Flexible and deadly combination of sword and handbow.

effects.description: Weapon: Sword and Handbow (fire while moving with 360 fire arc)

skillTree.name: Hawk-Eyed
skillTree.description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Deadeye
skillTree.description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 0 200 explosion damage (5m)

skillTree.name: Greatsword
skillTree.description: Deadly greatsword that can strike multiple enemies simultaneously.

skillTree.name: Eternal Hatred
skillTree.description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Inviolable
skillTree.description: Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Silver-Tongued Promises
skillTree.description: With promises of endless loot and vulernable shores to raid, Corsairs are more willing to accept a lesser payment for their services.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -8% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Boarding Preperations
skillTree.description: The Fleetmaster makes sure the blades and bolts of his crew have been sharpened to perfection prior to boarding enemy vessels.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +5% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +10% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +20% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Infamous Name
skillTree.description: Just the name of this Reaver inspires fear and dread in those who hear it, any Corsair would be eager to join his crew.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ruthless Butchery
skillTree.description: Seeing the savagery of their Reaver in combat inspires and frightens Corsairs under his command to fight harder and more ferociously than ever.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +3 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Cruel
backgroundSkills.description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +25%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Malevolent
backgroundSkills.description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.

backgroundSkills.name: Malicious
backgroundSkills.description: When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -25% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
	(local region)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags
	(own local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Vicious
backgroundSkills.description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ambush Master
backgroundSkills.description: From shadows we came...

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 during ambushes
	(all units in army)

Ambush success chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Blood of Asur
backgroundSkills.description: They will pay for what should be ours!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against High Elves
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +5 when fighting against High Elves
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Harpies of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: Deadly and fast as northern wind.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Harpies units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Shadows of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: They don't need armour to kill their enemies. Bloody!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(all units in army)

Armour: -5 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tyrant
backgroundSkills.description: They will tremble... You too, in time...

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: -3%
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: First Strike
backgroundSkills.description: For Khaine!
